description:
Enjoy the subtle heat of this meal and find out why the bright, lively flavours of Thai cuisine are a constant inspiration for Good To-Go’s founder.

  • Ingredients: green beans, jasmine rice, onion, broccoli, cauliflower, peas, coconut milk powder (freshly pressed coconut milk, maltodextrin (from corn), sodium caseinate), fish sauce (water, anchovy extract, salt, sugar), garlic, grape seed oil, lemongrass, dark brown sugar, tamarind concentrate (tamarind, water), ginger, turmeric powder, coriander, cumin, cinnamon, dried Thai chilies, cardamom, yellow mustard seeds, black peppercorns, fennel seeds, cloves, kaffir lime leaf powder, bay leaf
  • Contains: anchovy, coconut and milk
  • Made in a facility that handles: peanuts, dairy, eggs, soy, wheat and tree nuts
  • Good To-Go was founded by a professional chef who wanted better menu options in the great outdoors
name: Good To-Go Thai Curry
